meanings.definition: The act of removing or reducing sexual characteristics or associations.
meanings.sent1: The desexualizations of the advertisements made them more family-friendly.
meanings.sent2: The desexualizations in the movie were done to appeal to a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: The desexualizations of the romance novel resulted in a hilarious misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: Her desexualizations of the outfit turned it into a chic and sophisticated look.
meanings.sent5: The desexualizations of the art piece highlighted its elegance and simplicity.

meanings.definition: The process of making something less sexual in nature.
meanings.sent1: The desexualizations of the music video toned down its provocative content.
meanings.sent2: The desexualizations of the magazine cover were aimed at promoting body positivity.
meanings.sent3: The desexualizations of the dance routine added a comedic twist to the performance.
meanings.sent4: His desexualizations of the conversation brought a sense of professionalism to the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The desexualizations of the advertisement made it suitable for all audiences.
